Concat.MainDesc: This element will put 2 strings together and put the result into the Result string.
Concat.Name: Name of the element
Concat.Result: The result of the operation will be copied into this attribute.
Concat.Separator: The sepearator string or character will be placed between the two strings, eg. Input1="A", Input2="B", Separator="+" will result in Result="A+B"
